body_content.explanation: the parts of the hardware, software, programming languages, operating system, etc. in a mobile app or website that the user does not interact with (= use directly) but that are necessary for the app, website, etc. to work:
examples: A tech stack consists of two equally important elements: the frontend stack (client-side) and backend stack (server-side).
The server-side of software development is the backend tech stack.
